text: Aey logon jo iman laye ho, Allah ke madadgaar bano , jis tarah Isa ibn-e-Maryam ne hawariyon (disciples) ko khitaab karke kaha tha “Kaun hai Allah ki taraf (bulane) mein mera madadgaar”. Aur hawariyon (disciples) ne jawab diya tha : “hum hai Allah ke madadgaar”. Us waqt bani Israel ka ek giroh iman laya aur dusre giroh ne inkar kiya. Phir humne iman laney walon ki unke dushmano ke muqable mein taeed ki (aided) aur wahi ghalib hokar rahey
